title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags! With a pack of 50 bags, you'll have plenty to keep your kitchen clean and organized. These unscented bags are perfect for disposing of kitchen waste without any unwanted odors.

Each bag has a capacity of 13 gallons, providing ample space to hold all your daily trash. Made from tear-resistant white plastic, these bags are designed to withstand the rigors of everyday use. The Flex-tra strength ensures that the bags won't easily tear or puncture, giving you peace of mind when handling heavy or sharp objects.

Featuring a convenient red drawstring closure, these bags are easy to tie and secure, keeping your trash contained and preventing any unwanted leaks or spills. The red drawstring adds a pop of color and makes it easy to identify the closure.

In addition, these trash bags are compatible with Alexa Voice Shopping, allowing you to conveniently reorder whenever you're running low. With just a simple voice command, you can restock your supply of these durable and reliable trash bags.

Upgrade your kitchen waste disposal with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Say goodbye to flimsy and unreliable bags, and say hello to a cleaner and more organized kitchen.

Introducing the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags! This pack comes with a generous quantity of 50 bags, ensuring that you'll have plenty to last you. Each bag has a capacity of 13 gallons, providing ample space for all your kitchen waste.

These trash bags are unscented, perfect for those who prefer a neutral smell or have sensitivities to strong scents. Made from tear-resistant white plastic, these bags are designed to withstand the rigors of everyday use without easily tearing or ripping.

With their Flex-tra strength, these bags are built to handle heavy loads, making them ideal for disposing of bulky items or large amounts of waste. The red drawstring closure not only adds a pop of color but also ensures a secure and hassle-free way to tie and carry the bag without any mess or spills.

As an added convenience, these trash bags are compatible with Alexa voice shopping, allowing you to easily restock your supply with a simple voice command. Say goodbye to running out of trash bags when you need them the most!

Choose the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags for their durability, convenience, and reliability. Keep your kitchen clean and organized with these high-quality trash bags.
